text: The king then gave the order to Benaiah, son of Jehoiada, who went out and struck him dead. And the royal power was established in Solomon’s hand.
Ephah, Caleb’s concubine, bore Haran, Moza, and Gazez. Haran became the father of Gazez.
descendants of Hagab, descendants of Shamlai, descendants of Hanan,
they also forcibly circumcised any uncircumcised boys whom they found in the territory of Israel.
Then King Nebuchadnezzar fell down and worshiped Daniel and ordered sacrifice and incense offered to him.
After three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the teachers, listening to them and asking them questions,
Every day they devoted themselves to meeting together in the temple area and to breaking bread in their homes. They ate their meals with exultation and sincerity of heart,
